menu.elements

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.Spatial
      • com.jme3.scene.Node
        • menu.elements.MenuElement
          • menu.elements.Label
            • menu.elements.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.asset.CloneableSmartAsset, com.jme3.collision.Collidable, com.jme3.export.Savable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Button
extends Label
    A Button is a clickable Label, with an invisible box to catch clicks between characters.
